text: avanan suryane prakasamaniyiccat. candrane praseabhippiccatum avan tanne. atin avan vrd'dhiksayannal niscayiccirikkunnu. atuvali ninnalkk keallannalute ennavum kanakkum ariyan. yatharthya nisthamayallate allahu iteannum srsticcittilla. karyam grahikkunna janattinayi allahu telivukal visadikarikkukayan
